data.eml:eml: Novadessus viracocha, a new genus and species of Bidessini Sharp from Peru (Coleoptera, Adephaga, Dytiscidae, Hydroporinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Miller, Kelly B. (2016): Novadessus viracocha, a new genus and species of Bidessini Sharp from Peru (Coleoptera, Adephaga, Dytiscidae, Hydroporinae). ZooKeys 623: 125-130, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.623.10018, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.623.10018
